document.full_text: security forces using teargas and batons dispersed several hundred anti-government protesters in the mauritanian capital nouakchott on monday, the most serious clash in the west african state for nearly two months.
document.title: mauritanian police use teargas to break up protest
lines_and_colors: security forces using teargas and batons dispersed several hundred anti-government protesters in the mauritanian capital nouakchott on monday, the most serious clash in the west african state for nearly two months.
